data.message: There is someone to take my phone number by Facebook and threaten me how to get rid of it and prevent people from getting my phone number

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out to us. The Privacy Checkup will help you review who sees your posts, your settings for apps you’ve logged into with Facebook and who can see info from your profile like your phone number and email address. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2foGMR2. -Joe

Nu te supara,nu bagam a\in acelas sac pe toti,dar  la la noi,daca nu faci nimic,esti desconsidetarat,te considera un parazit,de care inceaerca ,comunitatea,numai sa scape,asta este stilul nostru de viata,I-mi pare rau,asta este realitatea(Avem si noi parazitii nostrii,de care nu vomn scapa nicio-data Ar trebui si la noi o mare deratizare(Schonberger Zoltan)
